name: AVAudioUnitTimePitch
desc: An object that provides a good-quality playback rate and pitch shifting independently of each other.

items.name: var overlap: Float
items.desc: The amount of overlap between segments of the input audio signal.

items.name: var pitch: Float
items.desc: The amount to use to pitch shift the input signal.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The playback rate of the input signal.
